metadata.title: CVE-2022-47654 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC MP4box 2.1-DEV-rev593-g007bf61a0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow ingf_hevc_read_sps_bs_internal function of media_tools/av_parsers.c:8261

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
